name: StarFighter (pedroMz)
description:
This game was made for 10 Day Themed Game Jam with the theme "Stars". 
It's a space shooter, just like asteroids or space invaders. I'm trying to get better with java script so I set the challenge of making a game without any libraries, ant here it is.

  • Shoot the enemies and get power ups that will help you survive.
    Controls:
    • A-D or Left-Right Arrow keys to turn left and right
    • W or Up Arrow to move forward
    • Space or Z to shoot

Hope you liked it.
*I didn't have time to add sound effects, but I'll try to do it before the jams ends.
*The assets were made using picoCAD, a free software for 3d modeling.
